trans-unit.source: Provides a list of valid skin IDs for a control at design time, based on the currently applicable theme.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SkinIDTypeConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> object to a string using the provided format context and type.
An T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context for the control being designed.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
`true`, if the conversion can be made; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> object to the specified type, using the specified context.
An T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context for the control being designed.
A T:System.Type that represents the type to convert to.
`true`, if a conversion can be made; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the given string to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> object using the specified context and culture information.
An T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context that represents the control being designed.
A T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.
If `null` is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The string to convert.
An object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID"></xref> object, if the conversion can be made; otherwise, `null`.
Converts the given <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> object to a string using the specified context and culture information.
An T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context that represents the control being designed.
A T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.
If `null`, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> object to convert.
The T:System.Type to convert value to (must be a ).
An object that represents the converted value.
Returns a set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> objects that can be applied to the control that is represented by the given format context.
An T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context that represents the control being designed.
context or properties of context can be `null`.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> that holds a set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> objects; otherwise, `null`, if the control does not support skins.
Returns a value indicating whether the control that is represented by the given context supports a set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> objects that can be picked from a list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> for the control being designed.
`true`, if <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SkinIDTypeConverter.GetStandardValues*"></xref> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, `false`.
